channel.title: Hardcoding help please [pics]
channel.description:
i cant hardcode i added this in my class8.java (on the right space) buy when i spawn i get this ftw
this is my code [code]if(i == 7602) // this is my code { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wear";//New option class8.anInt174 = 4673; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 1200; //zoom increase will make it smaller class8.anInt190 = 510; //model rotate up+down increase to move doen away from you class8.anInt198 = 1840; //model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt169 = 0; // model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 5; //model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 4674;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 4675;//female wearing class8.anInt164 = 337;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = 156;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Fighter Torso";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A Peanance fighter Torso".getBytes();//examin info }[/code] pic of results:
[IMG]http://img527.imageshack.us/img527/5798/helppl0xsw1.png[/img]

item.title: Hardcoding help please [pics]
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

you didnt add the model, get the .mdl file im not sure id the .dat model works but if you have the .mdl thats great, next get gzip from somewhere add the model into the gzip folder then go to a cmd prompt and navigate yourself the the gzip folder, next you gzip the model, then you get the .gz file and put it into the models folder on your client. next go to your client, log in and type add model (model id) without :: it shoudl say “model added succesfully” ro something like that, if it doesnt then you dont have the command set on the client, there should be a tutorial for it somewhere.

Read full topic
